Y

y - Variable in class entities.Entity
The left coordinate of the Entity
y - Variable in class projectiles.Projectile
the initial left coordinate of the projectile
y - Variable in class ui.PauseButton
The left coordinate
yDrawOffset - Variable in class entities.Player
Calculated Y - Positional offset for drawing Sprite
yLevelOffset - Variable in class states.Playing
Y-Offset being added to and subtracted from to render the level itself.
ypos - Variable in class ui.MenuButton
The top coordinate in pixels
yPos - Variable in class ui.HUD
Y-Position of the Portrait Sprite
